ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The breadth and depth of ethnographic genres from the class syllabus is remarkable. If the student has the opportunity to take this course, it's a no-brainer.
I would highly recommend this seminar to another student.
If the student has an interest in different types of writing or ethnography I would recommend it without question.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course should be required of all serious anthropologystudents. One cannot leave for the field without having been previously exposed to the capacious possibilities of writing ethnography, which this class brilliantly offers through kaleidoscopic angles.
